column1: 1594242760756035587,1594242760756035587@TheYemiKing No traffic in Ayetoro to justify that kind of road. At best a two-lane road to connect Ayetoro to Olodo junction and then direct the remaining fund to other road projects in the area. Ayetoro is the HQ of Yewa North but there was no good road connecting it to other Yewa towns. t_end
